text:
I'm working on postdoc fellowship apps and one of the things that's absolutely crippling me is this:

What if - big, BIG, IF - I get a postdoc fellowship to do research I want to do and then absolutely fail at my proposed research? 

Academic Twitter, thoughts? @AcademicChatter
